fields.name: GeneralInfo
fields.fieldText: ﻿Customer Claim General Information

fields.name: instructionsDifferentExpensesAndCompesation
fields.fieldText:
• ﻿﻿Select Customer Claim Type ending in "- compensation” when a passenger is asking for flat rate compensation in accordance with EU261/2004 due to a delayed or cancelled flight or missed connection.

﻿

  • Select Customer Claim Type ending in "- expenses" when a passenger is asking to be reimbursed for expenses that occurred due to a delayed or cancelled flight or missed connection.

fields.name: Concerns_a_person_with_reduced_mobility
fields.fieldText: Concerns a person with reduced mobility

validationRule.errorMessage: There are 9 numbers in a EuroBonus Number
PIR cannot be more than 10 characters, please validate the PIR number
Please add valid year in YYYY format older than 1990
No more than 20 characters are allowed for this field. You can only add one ticket number.
No more than 20 characters are allowed for this field. You can only add one ticket number.
BIC/SWIFT cannot be more than 11 characters. BIC/SWIFT should be formatted as: XXXXXXYY or XXXXXXYYYYY (X\'s are letters, Y\'s are letters or numbers)
Bank Account Number cannot be more than 35 characters.

fields.name: Customer_Claim_Question
fields.fieldText:
Is this a new customer claim?


If yes, click next

fields.name: errorScreen
fields.fieldText:
Claim cannot be created. There has been the below error:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Please click on "previous" to correct the error and try again.


If you cannot correct the error, please report the error using the Functional Product Support button.​

fields.name: Error_Screen
fields.fieldText:
Claim cannot be updated. There has been the below error:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Please click on "previous" to correct the error and try again.


If you cannot correct the error, please report the error using the Functional Product Support button.​

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
{!providedEmail} is not a valid email address and the customer claim cannot be created.

Please enter a valid email address in order to create the customer claim.
